description.value: This value set defines a set of codes from ICD10-PCS that can be used to indicate a type of procedure performed

copyright.value: The International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Procedure Coding System (ICD-10-PCS) was developed for the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS). CMS is the U.S. governmental agency responsible for overseeing all changes and modifications to the ICD-10-PCS.
